text: Edward John Sampson (born 1935), is a male former athlete who competed for England. ==Athletics career== He represented England and won a silver medal in the 4 x 440 yard relay at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:English male sprinters Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in athletics Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for England Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Living people
title: Ted Sampson
